nodes.bodyText:
sorry, I realize that setting this option whenever a failure reason needs to be sent creates a lot of duplicate code. Maybe a better solution would be to have a request-level internal key that can be set to true when that request should be allowed to receive error info (for any exception type).
THe approach in this PR should work, though!
This is a good idea, updated the PR to use an internal key.
thanks for making this change! I can change some of the code inside of AmbryLI to use this instead of the old approach.
